data.name: Aokana - Drama CD Vol 2
data.detailed_description:
The official Aokana Drama CD Volume #2.
It features 4 extra audio clips of Mashiro and Rika.

Tracklist:
Dating Diaries - Mashiro - Side A [10:43 min][MP4]
Dating Diaries - Mashiro - Side B [10:45 min][MP4]

Dating Diaries - Rika - Side A [10:18 min][MP4]
Dating Diaries - Rika - Side B [13:54 min][MP4]

It includes the English and Chinese versions.
It also includes the Japanese Audio and the official cover artwork.

fullgame.name: Aokana - Four Rhythms Across the Blue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
